channel.title: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums
channel.description:
Arrav is the next big rsps to fall. Really sad tbh, the Owner is a great guy. It's kinda funny though because near-reality got shut down and most of the players from there went to arrav :/
EDIT:
[img]http://puu.sh/1NLBx[/img]

item.title: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Jagex and SoulSplit have struck a deal. As seen on youtube, JaGex paid for the SoulSplit HQ, therefore enhancing their development and playerbase, getting JaGex more profit on their %10 of income or whatever.

item.title: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Frell:

You can say whatever you want, you can only be given a lawsuit for Slander if its published information (like on a news interview etc), otherwise it isn’t credible.

That was kind of the joke, Frell :P. Jagex would try just because It’s public, hah. Anyway… getting back on Topic (isn’t this on Topic though?), I don’t see why Jagex Moderators and such are posting on the Forums about the Private Servers. Doing this has no point, and they’re only making more people aware of RuneScape alternatives.

Read full topic
item.source: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums

item.title: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:

You can say whatever you want, you can only be given a lawsuit for Slander if its published information (like on a news interview etc), otherwise it isn’t credible.

item.source: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums

item.title: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:23, topic:478437”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=596661.msg4201267#msg4201267 date=1358224704]

Word on the street is that SS and Jagex struck up a deal.

I really don’t have any other explanation as to why they’re still up other than this. However, it also seems to be bullshit that they’re letting one server slip by to make a profit and shutting down others when they could be striking deals with all of the other ones that they supposedly shut down.

@Silab

Is that not what you did with the Silab Client by plastering ads everywhere on the page?
[/quote]
Why would they strike a deal? Private servers are almost always garbage and would give Jagex a bad name. If they wanted to do it they’d do it themselves.[/quote]

I wouldn’t put anything past Jagex since they were taken over by the infamous “Mod Mark Gerhard”.

A.K.A. “Markie Mark”

A.K.A. “Mark the Gold Shark”

A.K.A. “Mark Retard”

A.K.A. “Mark Tryhard”

A.K.A. (my personal favorite) “RuneScape’s Anti-Christ”

List of previous positions:

  • Security Architect at GTECH
  • Chief Technical Officer at Ministry of Data
  • Group Systems Manager at Sterling Relocation
  • Chief Operating Officer at Serious
  • Principal Consultant at Chromasonic Computer Centre Ltd
  • IT Director at Hospital I.T. Solutions (Pty) Ltd
  • Security Consultant at Rand Merchant Bank

INB4 I’m served with a lawsuit for Slander.

Read full topic
item.source: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums

item.title: Arrav + Jmod post on rs forums
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:15, topic:478437”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=596661.msg4201160#msg4201160 date=1358215345]
Word on the street is that SS and Jagex struck up a deal.
[/quote]

I really don’t have any other explanation as to why they’re still up other than this. However, it also seems to be bullshit that they’re letting one server slip by to make a profit and shutting down others when they could be striking deals with all of the other ones that they supposedly shut down.

@Silab

Is that not what you did with the Silab Client by plastering ads everywhere on the page?[/quote]
Why would they strike a deal? Private servers are almost always garbage and would give Jagex a bad name. If they wanted to do it they’d do it themselves.

Read full topic

@xI_c_E wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

absolutely you shouldn’t be upset you know Jagex plays hardball. Don’t want to lose your work? Then don’t steal it from others. You idiots make these threads crying about how cruel Jagex is. Why because they want to protect their work and money? What a crime that is :rolleyes:

Jagex must of slapped you across the head when they made you take down the client.
